website_summaries.verdict: A handy self-cleaning function and three water-temperature levels separates this sleek stainless steel water cooler from the rest of the pack.
pros: Water bottle conveniently loads on the bottom to avoid spills and heavy lifting
Indicator light lets you know when it’s time to change the bottle
Safe ozone technology sanitizes the dispenser with the press of a button
Dispenses water at hot, cold, or room temperature
cons: May not be quiet enough for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple days
customer_reviews.text: Update on my first review: turns out we just didn’t read the basic instructions and needed to do a self clean cycle and now it’s working fine. Their customer service was very persistent in trying to reach me and offered to send a new machine, but I declined as it was our fault and working fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lamison

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottom Loading and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my apartment. Buttons are easy to use and it’s bottom loading so I don’t have to lift heavy bottles when I’m home by myself. It’s not bulky and the style goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the cooler for maybe 3 weeks. I love it! My husband drinks way more water now. I always drank room temp. Water but now I like cold. I really like that I don’t have to flip the bottle over for a top feed. That is why I chose this cooler. It is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Nanquist

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first few days there was a taste issue and we lost almost a 5 gal jug.... when we started the new jug it was a bit better and after some time the taste disappeared and I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Shonara

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a water cooler/dispenser to replace my old one that died. I purchased this one because of the stainless steel water reservoir. The others I have tried, the water tastes like plastic. This brand works and looks good. It is just Extremely Noisy .
customer_reviews.author: R W

customer_reviews.title: Love this dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Our last dispenser was a top loader and very loud. This dispenser is so quiet and perfect. Works extremely well. I haven't tried the cleaning mode yet but everything else works like a charm. Hot water is very hot. We love this item!!
customer_reviews.author: procare

customer_reviews.title: 3 ports for each of the Hot-Cold-Room Temp water choices.
customer_reviews.text: Not a big deal but 3 ports for each of the Hot-Cold-Room Temp water choices. So you move your cup over the button you are pushing. Last one had one port for all. Also the water tank area is a little larger than some which makes for easy water in and out. Looks great works great, what more can one say...lol
customer_reviews.author: c banks

customer_reviews.title: Cold water dispenser quit after 4 months. . .
customer_reviews.text: The first few months we loved this thing. My entire family was drinking more water and hot drinks. It's beautiful and easy to use, also very quiet . Then 4 months in the cold water dispenser stopped working. I am an engineer so I did my research and troubleshooting, but its faulty equipment. The hot water is still working and such a wonderful feature. I am going to contact the manufacture. I am hoping they make this right. I spent the extra money hoping for a quality dispenser and I was initially very pleased now to extremely disappointed. I will follow up with what I'm told.
customer_reviews.author: Reina LeDoux

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working?
customer_reviews.text: Days after my return window closed on Amazon, it stopped working. No sound, no lights... literally does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Cole

customer_reviews.title: Brio water dispenser - great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Quiet with perfect water temperature. Excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wanting a refund
customer_reviews.text: Only had this product for 3-4 months and now it doesn't produce any cold water! Only warm to hot water. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Don't write a lot of reviews but for this transactions we're here to warn everyone that the unit just stopped working after about 7 months. Motor burned out or something, just will not dispense water at all. Also, it is almost impossible to get in touch with the manufacturer so we'll be eating the almost $300 we paid for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: timothy baze

customer_reviews.title: Can't get help or replacement.
customer_reviews.text: About 2 weeks after my return window, we started seeing clear white flakes in our water. Usually worst after a self clean cycle. Very disappointed in that I can't find a customer service number to get a warranty replacement it an answer to why we are getting these flakes already. Our last self cleaning machine lasted 4 years before it stopped "cleaning" the tanks. If anyone has a number for Brio, please share. $300 and this should dispense crystal clear water for years not weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT' BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Oct. 7, 2019 it is NOW DEC 6 and cooler is leaking water every where. There is NO way to contact BRIO and Amazon cant or wont do anything. Very disappointed after spending 300,.00 HORIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Just got the package today and it’s corners were dented and looked like the box overall was in rough shape. Once I opened the box, the unit itself was in worse shape than the box. Cracked corners, metal clips bent, gaps in between where the front and sides meet. Hopefully this is just a bad coincidence. I’ll update once I’ve received the new replacement unit, assuming it’s in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but it is noisy
customer_reviews.text: The only downfall is the cooling motor is very noisy. It's worth it if your goal is to hide the big plastic water bottle. You can turn the cooling motor off and just use room temperature and hot water. For colder water you can just add ice as an alternative, but if you're like me and white-noise annoys you, you won't like this cooler. Room temperature is actually cool enough for drinking in my opinion and I only turn the cooling motor on when I know I'm having guests over that might prefer cold water just because of the loud motor.
customer_reviews.author: Lett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this water cooler after my Primo top-loader started leaking. It is stylish in appearance, and easier to load as the water jug simply slides into the bottom compartment. There are three spigots for hot, cold and room temp. There is also a self-cleaning function, but I can't speak yet as to its effectiveness...also a night light. The bottled water tastes fine, and I am pleased with this cooler so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Passer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Was sick and tired of returning bag fulls of water bottles. Purchased this and get the 5 gallon jugs...easy to place jug as it slides in the bottom. This is quiet and awesome. So happy I purchased it. And LOVE the fact that I can disinfect it whenever I want
customer_reviews.author: M. Cass

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace the old one in our church. I was very impressed with the quality of the unit. All metal with smudge proof stainless steel. When I assembled it and plugged it in within 30 seconds the hot was steaming and the cold is as it has ice. Cannot hear it while it is sitting idle or when in use. All around great product. Only been in use for a few weeks but I am confident that it will be around for some time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This water cooler met all of my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler although a bit pricey, has met all of my expectations. I would order it again. This was easy to set up and has been easy to reload. The three temperatures are great. I have not had a chance to use the hot water. I have checked it's temperature and I think it would be suitable for tea or coffee. This product has been convenient and is closed by to my computers. I no longer drink sodas. The water has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Broken and they won't replace in 1st year
customer_reviews.text: We loved using this water unit. Unfortunately, it stopped working and has a constant red light flashing. We called into Brio and they gave us a work around sheet. It didn't work, still doesn't work after buying it only 8 months ago. We called back and asked if they would replace, they told us to call Amazon. We called Amazon and their customer service line is down for COVID-19. We need someone in customer service to jump in here and just replace our broken unit. That's all we want. Update: Brio reacted quickly with great customer service and shipped us a new unit for free. Thank You!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McQuilliams

customer_reviews.title: Water dispenser stopped cooling water after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product - when it works. I've had the product for only about 6 months. I paid $299 for it. Now it has stopped dispensing cold water, which is what we use the most of. The warrantee is for one year but not clear how to make a warrantee claim. I would very much like to replace this as soon as possible. I have reached out to Brio and have not yet heard back but their website says to handle returns with the retailer. Hoping to get this resolved quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: The cooler works well. The hot temp is 150 F cold about 48 F? I would like the cold colder but the wife likes it the way it is. Only have used the unit for 6 weeks. So far so good. The packaging is sub-par & that made me sad. The unit arrived with a dent in the front panel . It is noticeable but not bad enough to re-pack & return.
customer_reviews.author: Odin

customer_reviews.title: As listed
customer_reviews.text: Cold water and water hot enough to make coffee or tea.
customer_reviews.author: Henry King IV

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use AND change out bottles
customer_reviews.text: This is SO much EASIER to use then the gravity dispensers. Saves you from back and arm pain.
customer_reviews.author: E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Best thing to happen to me in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and looks great - especially as you don’t see an ugly water jug. It barely makes any noise. Hot water isn’t like the depths of hell hot but it’s hot enough to make tea. The room temp pours a bit more lethargically than the hot and cold feature. For someone who never learnt to drink hot drinks and holding cold drinks is an issue... the extra 15 seconds I wait to fill up my glass on room temp setting is not a deal breaker but nonetheless here I am whining about it.
customer_reviews.author: DuncanDoughnuts

customer_reviews.title: Overall great. A little loud. Child lock fairly useless.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very pleased with quality, ease of setup, ease of use and taste. The only things to know- as some other reviewers note, it is just a bit louder than I’d have expected. But it’s also energy smart- when the water level is super low, it stops cooling probably because the reservoir is too low to cool efficiently. The only other negative as I see it- the child lock on the hot setting does not seem to pose any sort of challenge to a three year old. It’s so easy to use the hot water button that you could fairly easily unlock it by accident. So if you have a little one, maybe look around before committing to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carter S.

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 3 mo.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on June 20, 2019. Today, Sep 26 it stopped working, the water doesn't get pumped to the chambers. Will be contacting manufacturer about warranty.
customer_reviews.author: FirstName LastName

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service! We ordered this unit last summer, and we loved everything about it. It looks attractive, it’s easy to change out the water bottles, the hot water is steaming hot and the cold water is ice cold! Unfortunately, the cold water function stopped working effectively. I called the customer service number and was offered some suggestions for resetting the temperature control. When it didn’t fix the problem I called them back and they immediately replaced the unit! Wow! They sent me a FedEx return label for the malfunctioning item and shipped a new one right away. This is what is meant by standing behind your product! The new unit is absolutely perfect — imagine how impressed we are!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a few weeks but I am loving it. It does make a small noise when filling from the cold dispenser. Also, sometimes hard to find the water to fill a bottle. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: missbass

customer_reviews.title: Unusually Loud
customer_reviews.text: Super load after filling a glass. Like, really load. We had the whirlpool before this one, and it was quiet so the noise level of this one caught me off guard. The looks of the unit is nice. The spout that goes into the water jug is straight. Our Whirlpool had a bend in it so it used all the water in the jug instead of leaving an inch at the bottom. I really hope this unit holds up as it was nearly 300$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: have been using it for a week. it doesn't take too much space, very quiet, no after taste (flashed previously with less then 2 liters of water), easy to insert container underneath, easy to set up. hot water is very hot and cold water is cold - convenient, saves your time!
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: 4 1/2 stars.. Everything is great so far... The room temp water comes out a little slow. If it is every up for redesign, maybe the night light switch could go somewhere more accessible so the other switches are not turned off. (Or put a light sensor on it)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy (39)

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Original cooler did not dispense water so I returned it. My money was refunded and I then received a free cooler. Cannot believe how great this company is. Love my new cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but takes over 10 gallons to get rid of the taste
customer_reviews.text: The machine looks great, is easy to setup and overall good value, however there was a noticeable taste in the water - some described it as metallic and others described it as plastic - it's hard to say just what the taste is - other than it's not great. I've tried to run water through, now on 3rd 5 gallon bottle and it seems to be getting better. I'll update when we've got further along.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worse than Whirlpool
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced my old Whirlpool with this model. Pros: It's new. It has enough space for tall water bottes. It look nice, though I wish that the curvature of the top section (it's flat) would match the bottom. Cons: it is VERY loud. It seems to be buzzing all of the time and sometimes with high pitch rattle. It has enough hot water for a glass, but the second glass is already lukewarm. I used to fill 50 ounce kettle with hot water with Whirlpool, but with this the water becomes lukewarm on half the kettle. Then I have to wait around 10 minutes to fill another half and by that time my first half is cold. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan Sudentas

customer_reviews.title: Such a great water dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: We. LOVE. This. Water dispenser. It has changed the way we live out life! We drink so much more HEALTHY water now! The instant hot and chilled water features are SO nice! The chilled is deliciously cold, and the hot I use to fill a pot to quickly boil water! It’s perfect tea temperature on demand. It’s an attractive water dispenser and incredibly easy to change the bottles out. Live the night light feature as well! All-in-all, I’m beyond happy with this dispenser - one of the best purchases I’ve made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water cooler! Cold water dispense is cold and hot water dispense is hot!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and has worked flawlessly. Very easy set up and it looks better in my opinion than the competitors. It is more expensive than some but it has a ultraviolet self cleaning function which I think is very important. Who really has the time or energy to be cleaning a water cooler? The UV light also kills germs. I saw the few bad reviews but I also saw anytime there was a problem the company offered to replace the product or refund the money. You really can't ask for a better guarantee. That being said I have had no issues and am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Camp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Design! Very well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Packed really well. Setup was easy and quite straight forward. Works very well. A number of key features induced me to buy this cooler. Number One: Self Cleaning! Many other very useful features. I'll follow up my review once I have used it for a couple of months to answer some questions. FOLLOW-UP: We've been using it for several days. First, the machine is VERY quiet! It works like a charm. Hot is HOY! Cold is comfortable. Room Temperature is a great setting! Overall we are quite satisfied and would highly recommended this water cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade to my older bottom-loadingPrimo dispenser and was excited for it to come in. The hot comes out nice and hot and it started up just fine. My only concern is that it dispenses the water very slowly from the spouts - much slower than my older bottom-loading Primo machine. It takes forever for my water jug to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Set up is easy. Just follow the directions. Easy to put in water bottle because it’s a bottom filler. Quiet smooth operation. I especially like the ability to turn on and off the hot and cold water unit and still dispense the room temperature water. Despite what others say this j it is extremely quiet. Would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. She & her family absolutely love it. They love the bottom loading option for 2 size water tanks. The hot water option is a plus & having a small child the lock protection safety feature on it is essential. They love getting rid of water bottles sitting around their home half full too. May have to buy myself one.
customer_reviews.author: She She

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our prior household water dispenser. It's easy to use, and unlike our previous one, the dispenser spout is very easy to see, even without the night light. Temperature almost immediately after setup was about 170 out of the heated side. I didn't check the temperature of the cold, but it was perfect (per my daughter).
customer_reviews.author: J. Collick

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  just improve the pump
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I like the option of sliding the water container and not having the container exposed. The self cleaning is great. Only issue is the pump, takes time for the sensor to activate the pump for delivery of water.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Many problems. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Parts come loose very easily. The cold water stopped working after only a few months. Not worth the money. Much cheaper ones that last a lot longer. A few days after the cold water stopped working so did the hot water. I was able to reset it by unplugging it for a few days and it started working again. Every now and then I unplug it bc it tends to get hot in the back. I also don’t keep the hot water on all the time. Just turn it on right before I plan on using it.
customer_reviews.author: E Rz

customer_reviews.title: Great Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: When I reviewed this product, I purchased because it is a 5 star product. I must say, I have not had the Brio very long, however, it has been a 5 star buy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It does not accommodate all 5 gallon water bottles as advertised. For example, the 5 gal. Pure Water from Home Depot will not fit inside the dispenser. Now I'm stuck with 5 gal. of water that can't be returned. Also, the bottle adapter tube (hose) does not fit inside 3 gallon water bottles. It is too long and only fits 5 gallon bottles. They should provide 2 different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Gijo

customer_reviews.title: I love this machine!!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery and set up was simple. I plugged it in and within a few minutes had steaming hot water and excellent cold water. The unit is VERY quiet. I hardly notice it. It makes a little noise while it's filling, but that's to be expected. It only lasts a minute or so. I pray that it lasts, as I am very happy with this purchase right now!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lahrman

customer_reviews.title: DONT DO IT, cheap and doesn’t fit bottles well
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. When the box arrived the machine was already so beat up. And there were huge dents in the metal sides which made it obvious the material was cheap and flimsy. I then tried to load a standard 5 gallon water bottle In and it just didn’t fit right. The fit was so tight. I did not have an issue with any other dispenser. Not sure what brand of water bottle this works for but it was not good for Sparklettes.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped cooling water after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This was great for 6 months but now the cold water is no longer cold. Sounds like it's cooling the water and the indicator light is on but only getting room temperature water. We tried draining it, cleaning it & powering it off overnight to see if that would work but still got room temp water. Watched the YouTube videos to see if there was anything we can do to fix the problem but we couldn't even take the top piece off, afraid of breaking it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instruction booklet
customer_reviews.text: The instructions booklet is quite vague or doesn’t even mention controls or features of product. The product comes with an ozone cleaning feature but isn’t even mentioned in booklet. Had to read about feature in outside box but do not know how often or how long cycle lasts
customer_reviews.author: Steve Botto

customer_reviews.title: My granma loves it !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother recently moved into a new apartment that didn’t have its own water filtration. I did some research on a few brands of water coolers to help her get the clean water she needs. After looking into a few brands I decided to go with brio because of the sleek design and the easy functions. I love the fact that it is a bottom loading water cooler and you don’t have to do it the old fashion way. I surprised my grandma with the new cooler this weekend and she is so happy! We already got it set up and ready to use. Thanks for creating a product that helps the elderly get filtered water.
customer_reviews.author: madamnusi

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water cooler. The self-cleaning feature may or may not make any difference, but it is nice to have. The only time I ever really hear the water cooler is when I've kicked off the self-clean, and even then it isn't loud or anything, and only lasts a short while. I've had a few minor issues with it not correctly detecting a full water jug, but fiddling with the bottom tube and hose thing always seems to sort it out. I turned the light on when I first set it up, and it's been going strong for several months now with no sign of dimming.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This water cooler dispenses water like it supposed to, but the noise level is off the charts! Not only when I use it, but the motor runs constantly and is very loud. Would not recommend. Did I mention it is LOUD?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this we were using a Zero Water pitcher in the refrigerator. While the pitcher is a good quality product the filters are highly expensive and it takes up a lot of room in the fridge and we were going through the filters like crazy. This water cooler is quiet, has three temperature settings. Even cleans itself-wish the house did! HA! Perfect for gatherings and NO MORE buying water in plastic bottles. Great for the environment! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: So good but so loud
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, keeps me from overspending on water bottles and creating so much plastic waste. But boy is this thing loud, both the pump and the refrigeration. When both this thing and my fridge are going it can drown out other sounds in my house. Worst of all its not harmless white noise, its high pitched ungulating sounds. If it wasnt for this id give it more stars
customer_reviews.author: Ner0

customer_reviews.title: So Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to drink water ever! I drink more water now than I ever have. This couldn’t be any easier. Press a button for hot, room temp or cold water. The water bottle goes at the bottom (very convenient!) and it has an ozone sanitizer to keep the tube and the water from getting bacteria and smelling funny. The cold water comes out icy cold. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David/Myrna Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Have only just started using this product. It was very easy to set up and start using right out of the box. So far it’s much better than the Whirlpool that died on me shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Handy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new cooler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a cheaper model i had and I could not be happier with it. The hot water is hot enough to make tea but not so hot as to be dangerous. The cold could be just abiy colder but it works very well for me. I'm not sure about the complaints about it being noisy, the sound is moderate at its worst and not constant. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: BOUGHT NEW. Water Pump Does Not Draw In Water
customer_reviews.text: Brand new... The pump would not suck up water. I was frustrated. Returning now. Literally just going to pour water from the 5 gallon bucket into a pitcher. The fridge gets cooler than any water dispenser. Microwave is quick for heating water. No need for the luxury anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ant-Man!

customer_reviews.title: compact
customer_reviews.text: This unit is significantly smaller than my previous water coolers. And with the bottle underneath it doesn’t feel so intrusive in my kitchen. It is relatively quiet and able to get all but the last drop out of the bottle. the ozone cleaning function works as described and is much easier to use than cleaning the unit manually. would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it works
customer_reviews.text: Ok... The machine is a bit finicky. YOU HAVE TO DO THE SELF CLEANING CYCLE AS RECOMMENDED. Also check the tube from the motor to the bottle cap. If they get loose, it won't siphon water. That said, mine stopped working altogether. BUT customer service at BRIO (go to the manufacturer- not the vendor) was stellar. They had a new one out to me pronto. Thank you, Brio.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Lauzon

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the Road
customer_reviews.text: The three different outputs takes time to get used to when the old one had two. It doesn't have a water empty indicator and the door has no handle or way to easily open it. Water at room temperature flows at pump speed as it has no accumulation tank. That knocks it down to three stars given the above average price I expected better.u
customer_reviews.author: Ridgeback

customer_reviews.title: Distance from dispensing ports to floor
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser arrived intact and was easy to set up. The noise of the pump can be annoying when topping off a gallon container. I find the height of the dispensing ports are too low, (OK for small children). The water temperature dispensed (as measured in an aluminum cup), is 163.3F for the HOT water and 56.2F for the COLD water.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice of shipping carrier
customer_reviews.text: Product works well no problems. The only issue was with shipping. Amazon shipped using the postal service. This package was to large to be delivered by a rural carrier which resulted in me having to make an unnecessary trip to the post office to pick it up. Hopefully in the future they will use a carrier like ups or fedex who have the ability to handle products of this size.
customer_reviews.author: V. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This arrived with a dent and a bent rod in two places.  Too big to return
customer_reviews.text: I love this water cooler however I have concerns that it was used before. It arrived with a dent in the outside door and I was given a credit to accept that. That was great. However, it was discovered that the metal rod inside arrived bent in two places and I do not think it will last. I am not sure how to repack it for a return as I discarded the styrofoam it was packed in. I do have the box. I need help but do not know how to reach out to the seller. It was too much money even with a discount to keep with this defective rod. I will attach a picture.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard. This will burn you.
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused as to how this product has more than 4 stars and is considered an “Amazon Choice” product. For months now anytime we use the hot water, the water runs non stop for 5-10 minutes afterwards. It’s impossible to collect all the water and our wood floor now has water damage. The worst part about this product is that there is NO customer service. Amazon has no contact with the company and there is no listed CS information for Brio. Avoid this product if you don’t want to get your hand burned.
customer_reviews.author: Rob2234

customer_reviews.title: Room temp stopped pumping water - Hot is very noisy
customer_reviews.text: When we first got it, we noticed that the Room Temp water (center button) was pumping at about half the speed of the hot and cold. Not knowing any better, we assumed this was normal. Time went on and our Amazon Return Window closed on Sept 27, 2020. Now, here it is October 6, 2020, and the Room Temp dispenser has stopped pumping water and the hot water dispenser is very noisy, as if something inside the machine is falling apart. I have never been in this situation with an Amazon purchase, where the product started falling apart shortly after the return window closed. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I initially concerned about the price I am paying for this product but the quality it is offering is worth. The cooler we're using earlier were giving cold water almost for the first glass then it was giving the room temperature. This one gives the room temperature right away. Cold side is good and bottom loading is great. I haven't used the cleaning and hot water functions yet, but so far very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ozgur

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! It is exactly what we wanted and more. I love the self cleaning feature-totally worth it. The water tastes amazing (except right after the cleaning cycle. It has a metallic taste the first time you fill up a water bottle/glass. So we fill up 1 glass and dump it out, and then it tastes fine).
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for health!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment for your health! Easy to use, self cleaning! I post on my Amazon Influencer page as my favorite products. www.amazon.com/shop/nafigueira
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Fryer

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months this Dispenser stopped dispense water
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this Dispenser, just after 6 months it stops dispense any water even though my 5 gallons bottle still not empty yet. I think the pump burned out or something, the quality of this Dispenser is very bad , now I lost 300 bucks for the Dispenser that won't dispense water 😤. What a waste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tom N

customer_reviews.title: Only works when new
customer_reviews.text: LOVED for the first month. Then it stopped working. Water was not cold. Cold waters spicket was dispensing 69 degree water. And compressor was REALLY loud. Reached out to seller & they were great. Returned defective one & got new one. Fast forward 3 months & we are having the same issues. Compressor SUPER LOUD & water is not cold. Would like to return but don’t know how. When I click on my orders it doesn’t give me option to report a problem. Help!,,
customer_reviews.author: Disapointed

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great, easy loading, not quiet during cooling
customer_reviews.text: No more dead lifts and spilling water all over the place - very glad we switched from the top load to bottom load. No need to wipe the bottle top either. The only drawback I have found is that the compressor can be noisy (45 dB) when it runs to cool the water. I got used to it and don’t notice it if the TV is on. When it isn’t cooling, there is no sound. So, despite other reviews, it is NOT quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: looks great and always temp consistant
customer_reviews.text: not able to get hot water working but everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The kids like to fill their bottles, so they drink more water!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great looking. Cold water at a touch. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this water dispenser. It's great looking and really quiet. I love the water taste, deep rock. I made the mistake of leaving the heater on for hot water when I was waiting for the water to be delivered. I burnt out the hot water coil. Oh well. I love everything else it does.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette R. Staffey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this dispenser for about three weeks. It is so much easier to use than our last one where you has to put the bottle on top. It is quiet, the cold water is cold, the room temperature water is room temperature and I’m sure the hot will be hot when we try it.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great clean water, bottom loading is better
customer_reviews.text: I had a $100 top loader before but bottom loading makes so much more sense and is easier. The Ozone cleaning feature is great and the night light helps. I think the extra money just for silver/chrome over the front top is too much though. I've seen others with all of these features for less. Limited edition is an aesthetic choice.
customer_reviews.author: Giskard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by the sturdiness of my new Brio Cooler. Saw this Limited Edition version through amazon and was pleased by the features it provided. For one the self cleaning ozone works with a button and doesn’t require any work from the consumers end. Second the easy access bottom loading, which is by far the most impressive. Thirdly was the quality of the cooler. It was sleek and looks elegant in our living room. Loving it already. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Miro P.

customer_reviews.title: Cold water
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, he loves the way the water tastes and it comes out COLD. Enough to freeze your teeth on a hot day!
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler, good price!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Brio bottom load cooler. The first we purchased was the step up, the Moderna, which is significantly more expensive. We like this one better! I can fit a very tall 21-oz water bottle under it, unlike the Moderna (see pics). I also like the physical push buttons better.
customer_reviews.author: H. John Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Cold water not cold enough
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that the cold water isn’t cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda D

customer_reviews.title: Gonna love not having to lift that 5 gallon bottle
customer_reviews.text: While I can still lift and set the 5 gallon water bottle, once we put new flooring in I realized that I sometimes splashed or spilled as I did it. This solves the problem. Bonus we have the 3 different temps again...and I love the self cleaning part of it!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Works great, room temp option made some staff happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler to replace another vendors model that had quit working properly (all water was coming out hot). Setup was simple and the bottom loading is nice as not everyone could properly replace the water on the previous top loading version especially without making a mess. A few staff members also like the room Temp option in addition to the hot and cold water options.
customer_reviews.author: ccharmatz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water dispenser. The water tastes fine, always cold. Love the bottom load. Self-cleaning feature is amazing. The unit is very quiet. The only issue is the directions. Couldn't find the self-cleaning button and the directions didn't show where it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Am so glad we bought this cooler. It is just as advertised and easy to fill with new jug. I haven't used the hot water yet but love the cold water areas. It has taken the place of all the water bottles we had to buy. Good product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Water pump is not durable. It Should last at least 5 years —if not longer — not just 7.5 months .
customer_reviews.text: The water pump just quit .. quit working at just over 7.5 months . Of course you Gotta have the pump working ( like it’s supposed to ) so as to get water up and out of the 5 gallon jug ( loaded in the bottom of the cooler ) —up into the water tank / reservoir
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Can be a bit noisy at times
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with our Brio dispenser. It's very attractive in our stainless steel kitchen, it keeps hot water hot and cold water cold, and the self cleaning feature is used often. The only downside to our experience is that the refrigeration coil on the back of the unit can set up a vibration that becomes a fairly noticeable buzzing at times. In our kitchen it's no problem, but if you're considering locating this near a bedroom it could be an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: RichInNM

customer_reviews.title: If it keeps running, it's a great unit.
customer_reviews.text: The bad- after 13 months the water pump stopped working. The good- Customer service is fantastic, after troubleshooting and pulling out the water pump, I tested it and it wasnt working. So I emailed brio asking if they could send me a replacement pump. I was out of the warranty period by a month so expecting to have to pay a little something, which I didnt. They got my information. And 4 days later a whole new unit showed up at my door!
customer_reviews.author: Jps

customer_reviews.title: Strange taste to the water--tastes like hose water
customer_reviews.text: I love the product overall, but after installing my first 5 gallon jug of water, the water tastes like a garden hose. I'm guessing this is because of the hardware within the dispenser. I hope the taste goes away because it really ruins it for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was so tired of purchasing plastic water bottles we decided to go with the water dispenser. We love it! Doesn’t make noises like in other reviews only after you use it. But it’s not long or loud! Would certainly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lavion

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice water cooler. I like that it loads in the bottom. Fits in nicely with my stainless steel appliances. The blue light at the dispenser is a nice feature as well. Fast shipping and the box was in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: JBAP

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooler my family has Bought!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this water cooler is so silent in our apartment. The old cooler would make a lot of noise in our living room and we honestly needed a change. This cooler also has a very pure taste of water, we use it for drinking water, making coffee with the hot water and many other stuff. Overall I’m very happy with this product and just recommended it to my mom for her house.
customer_reviews.author: Vahe

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of box
customer_reviews.text: Broken out of box when packaging was perfect. Poor QC before shipping as this should have easily been caught. All Photos also show the water jug in them (which i assumed meant it was included), nowhere does it say not included, and no water jug came with it so not only was it broken but it also didn't contain everything shown in the photos. All-around a very poor system for $300 .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. American

customer_reviews.title: Try a different machine
customer_reviews.text: Big problem. Stopped making cold water before I had it two weeks. Lived everything about it. But no cold water makes everything else a moot point.
customer_reviews.author: Someone who bought.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cold water is super cold. Unit is quiet. I live in the desert so hot water isn't needed. Very easy to get bottles in and out. Unit looks good. Saving environment not buying cases of bottled water anymore.I tried the hot water when I first got it. Like the child safe feature on hot water button.Very hot water. 3 gallon and 5 gallon bottles fit perfect. Overall very happy with this purchase😎
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality, ease-of-use>
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product met or exceeded my expectations. It was easy to unwrap and setup, and I'm happy with its functionality! So pleased with it that I plan on buying a second one for another location in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ahlers

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around I decided on this one because of the self cleaning feature. Now maybe I missed it but I could not for the life of me find out hot to get the self cleaning feature to work. But I did finally figure it out. Outside of that, I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D Yip

customer_reviews.title: Very professional look for my medical office
customer_reviews.text: It's just short.......other reviewers said the same thing. It almost seems as it was made for children. At 5'9", I have to bend over to put my empty cup under the valve. However, the design is professional and I'll definitely keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Brio Self Cleaning Bottom Loading Water Cooler Water Dispenser – Limited Edition - 3 Temperature Settings - Hot, Cold & Cool Water - UL/Energy Star Approved
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT BOTTOM LOAD: Stop struggling to pick up heavy water bottles and simplify your life with the easy bottom load water cooler. Save your back from strains and invest in the cooler that allows for easy bottle replacements, as the bottom load cabinet conveniently keeps your bottle safely tucked away.

SELF-CLEANING: Maintain the cleanliness of the cooler with the Ozone Self-Cleaning feature. Enjoy the ease of maintaining a clean cooler with minimal effort, simply press the button and let the unit take care of the rest.

HOT, COLD & ROOM TEMPERATURE: When you use our water cooler dispenser you can choose between crisp cold, room-temperature and piping hot output, making it ideal for cool refreshments or toasty beverages.

NIGHTLIGHT: Nightlight feature gives visibility in the dimmest settings. Never struggle to see what is being poured or accidentally dispense from the wrong spout. The nightlight also allows for full visual access to the removable drip tray, so you know when it is time to clean it.

CHILD-SAFETY LOCK: Never worry about accidental pouring of hot water again with the two-step dispensing on the hot-water spout. Simply release the lock located above the dispensing button and enjoy soothing hot water at your fingertips. Rest assured that the safety of you and your loved ones are in the hands of Brio Water Engineers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars825 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
